body_html:
Thanks for the PR, this is a method we should have. But yes, it will need a test. Also, instead of the generic "get_collection" I'd suggest 2 methods: scope.trainable_variables and scope.global_variables -- to mimic the TF methods.

Is this PR still in active development?

body:
Thanks for the PR, this is a method we should have. But yes, it will need a test. Also, instead of the generic "get_collection" I'd suggest 2 methods: scope.trainable_variables and scope.global_variables -- to mimic the TF methods.

Is this PR still in active development?
